colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018B (CES PHU LUGS RTZIS KYI LEGS BSHAD MKHA' PA'I MGUL BRGYAN DPYOD LDAN SNYING NOR LAS, ,GSHIN RTZIS CUNG ZAD SPROS PA'I 'DI NI NYAG PHRA NI DANG, LTUM PO DON GRUB DBANG RGYAL GYI NAG DKAR RTZIS KYI BYINGS SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU 'GRAM BA'I ZLA BRAL LTA BU YIG CHA DANG GOD MA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I GSHIN RTZIS KYI YIG CHA MANG PO NANG NAS, PHYUNG NAG SH'AKYA KA RI'I MDZAD PA'I GSHIN RTZI 'DI NI HA CAN DGOS PA YIN 'DUG KYANG, GZHAN YANG PAn CHEN SMON 'GRO BA'I DPE CHA RGYAN DUS, 'CHI MED BDE BA'I GSHIN RTZIS BSKOR DANG BSTUN PA RANG NYID KYIS RIGS BAS DPYAD DE, ,THANG TSIG GI BCOS THABS SOGS CUNG ZADD GSAL BAR BYAS PA SPYI DON GSUM PA SOGS BSDUS SHING DON TSANG BAS 'TSOL DANG, DUR BTAB LAS GZHAN NI TSOGS PAR BGYIS PA'I 'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI 'CHI BA MED PA'I TSE YI RIGS 'DZIN THOB PA DANG, RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS GNAS SKABS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUNR GING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
